def main():
    # Initialize a bytearray with some data
    data = bytearray([104, 101, 108, 108, 111, 32, 119, 111, 114, 108, 100])

    # Convert bytearray to bytes
    byte_data = bytes(data)

    # Print the bytes
    print("Bytes data:", byte_data)

    # Print the string representation of the bytes
    print("String representation:", byte_data.decode())

    # Modify the bytearray
    data[5] = 33  # Change space (32) to exclamation mark (33)

    # Convert modified bytearray to bytes and print
    modified_byte_data = bytes(data)
